title: Starguardian soraka missing voice pack
body: i bought her skin Yet it just like the base skin with a new recall can u guys fix her skin plz this feel like i wasted 10$ for a improved base skin....

replies.body: so wait..... i was lie to from all pbe video showing of her skin O_ o cuz on youtube u can find people showing off her skin ...

> [{quoted}](name=extraleftover,realm=NA,application-id=LqLKtMpN,discussion-id=KAUyeUU4,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2017-09-07T20:27:34.868+0000)
>
> so wait..... i was lie to from all pbe video showing of her skin O_ o cuz on youtube u can find people showing off her skin ...

You were not lied to, her skin was never advertised, nor supposed to have a new voiceover.

That is, in fact, what you bought. 1350's bring nothing more than new effects, model updates, new animations, and occasionally a couple new lines on a launch skin to fit the theme a bit (like Program Camille getting some interactions with the project skins).

1350 RP tier skins don't have different voice packs.

The only Star Guardian skins with different voices are Ahri and Jinx.

Hey! 

Star Guardian Soraka does not have new VO. Only Star Guardian Ahri has new VO because she's a legendary skin. I think you may have stumbled upon a player-made voice pack.

The thing that i'm still confused about is why Star Guardian Ahri was the legendary skin.. Soraka literally fits the Star Guardian theme more than anyone because she's the starchild anyway.

The only reasons why I see why this happened is because of the typical Ahri favouritism or just for the Ahri fanbase, the amount of skins Ahri has is more than any other champion at this point. Looking at fan bases Yasuo's and Riven's for example they both have only 4-5 skins yet Ahri has 7.

Apparently if someone gets an 1820 skin, they need to have an unexpected or new theme that doesn't rely on their base theme. This means that Soraka the star child cannot be Starry in her 1820 skin. Dunno how true that is but someone said it a while back.
wait that a thing? cause i get a link about this? oh wait are we even allowed?

> http://tinyurl.com/yd7syjml 

Says that we're going to get a new visual appearance and I'm pretty sure SFX stands for sound effects. I feel slightly ripped off knowing that Soulstealer Soraka is a 1350 having a voice effect and animations. 

I'm not really taking the excuse "Ahri's a legendary so that's why she has it." I'm just saying but that's really cheap to try and make Ahri look better when she comes with a voice announcer completely specific to SR (which I'm assuming its for the event but I could be wrong and its perma?). That should be enough differences. Even then I feel like Jinx compared to Ahri should be down graded to a 1350 in price if it comes back in sale for others. Since its doesn't have all the same jazz as Ahri does with hers.

Edit 1: Prime time Draven has new voice lines and he's a 975 skin. So......

That should be enough differences. Even then I feel like Jinx compared to Ahri should be down graded to a 1350 in price if it comes back in sale for others. Since its doesn't have all the same jazz as Ahri does with hers.
> 
> Edit 1: Prime time Draven has new voice lines and he's a 975 skin. So......

He's an event skin. 
He's legendary tier but riot lowered it to 975.

They did it for surprise fiddle also.
Well.. it's one of the skins you could test.. it's a 1350rp skin so it's also not surprising that she has not a special voice pack
Someone did not even bother watching SkinSpotlight before purchasing a skin.
